channel.title: [PI] Bank inventory & bank worn armour buttons errors
channel.description:
while on my server today i got an error while using the deposit all button in my bank...here it is [this has never happened before]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32925315/error.jpg[/img]
my button had worked perfectly hundreds of times but now it does this..can anyone explain why?
also getting this one with my bank worn armour button
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32925315/error2.jpg[/img]
somebody mind explaining why this decides to happen now? thanks in advance l0lc0pt3r. will post anything needed.

item.title: [PI] Bank inventory & bank worn armour buttons errors
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

well i fixed the first error now when i click my deposit worn armor button, it deposits my inventory as well. and in clickinbuttons.java the break is there. any help?

[quote=“l0lc0pt3r, post:3, topic:422872”] c.getItems().bankItem(z, t, 2147000000); [/quote]
You have another problem just as big… Omfg, it pisses me off when I see people doing that.

item.title: [PI] Bank inventory & bank worn armour buttons errors
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

			case 82020: //Deposit Inventory
				for(int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) {
					c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i], i,c.playerItemsN[i]);
						}
				break;
			case 82024: //Deposit worn items
                        	for(int r=0; r<c.playerEquipment.length; r++)
                		{
                       			{
                                int item2 = c.playerEquipment[r];
                                if((item2 > 0) && (item2 < 199999))
                                {
                                        c.getItems().removeItem(item2, r);
                                }
                        }
                }
        for(int z = 0; z < 101; z++) {
        for(int t = 0; t < 28; t++) {
                c.getItems().bankItem(z, t, 2147000000);
                }
        }
break;

there ya go. anything else u need?
